citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS official during the inspection process at 16:00 on
12-8-15. One owners phone number has been changed and phone calls to the other licensee were not returned
for several hours. All contact information needs to be provided so licensee can be reached more easily in order to
conduct an inspection and assure the welfare of the animals.
To be corrected with future inspections.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS official during the inspection process at 16:00 on
12-8-15.   One owners phone number has been changed and phone calls to the other licensee  were not returned
for several hours.   All contact information needs to be provided so licensee can be reached more easily in order to
conduct an inspection and assure the welfare of the animals.
To be corrected with future inspections.
